summary: The classic English ghost story gets a revision when a college professor finds himself plagued by spectral visions.
cast: Ed Stoppard|Sophia Myles|Russell Tovey|Isaac Andrews|Paul Kaye|Greg Wise|Joanna Vanderham|Kenneth Collard|Anna Andresen|Harry Burton|Alan Drake|Sebastian Dunn|Luke Brandon Field|Melanie Gray|Eileen Nicholas|Duncan Pow|Annabel Riley
title: Blackwood
